sentences.en: Both did so, their cheeks flaming red; they kept their heads down.
sentences.cn: 都拜了,两个人脸上飞红, 都低着头.

sentences.en: Even the flaming Agate , was agreed that you excelled as Macbeth.
sentences.cn: 甚至热情的阿加特, 都承认你擅长于扮演麦克白.

sentences.en: Farmers don't need much prompting to tell you that "flaming dog owners" are the scourge of their lives.
sentences.cn: 不用怎么提示农场主们就会告诉你，“该死的养狗人”是他们生活的灾星。

sentences.en: Ferocious animals and birds fled dry rivers and flaming forests to attack human beings.
sentences.cn: 一些怪禽猛兽,从干涸的江湖和火焰般的森林里跑出来,残害人民.

sentences.en: Flaming torches were positioned at intervals along the terrace.
sentences.cn: 沿台阶每隔一段距离布置有燃烧着的火炬.

sentences.en: From the very first this flaming enthusiasm was mixed with base elements.
sentences.cn: 从一开始,这种灼烈的狂热就和卑下的动机混合在一起了.

sentences.en: Here they take fire on the trees and hang there flaming.
sentences.cn: 而这里的树叶却像是挂在树梢卜的火焰,发出耀眼的光芒.

sentences.en: I was in a flaming temper.
Oh God, you get so flaming worked up about everything.
sentences.cn: 哦，天哪，你总是这么激动，真该死。

sentences.en: Residents panicked as flaming petrol poured down the street.
sentences.cn: 燃烧的汽油沿街流淌，居民惊慌失措。

sentences.en: She has had a flaming row with her lover.
sentences.cn: 她刚和恋人发生了激烈的争吵。

sentences.en: The landscape offers a flaming tribute to the end of summer.
sentences.cn: 大地向夏末奉献火红的礼品.

sentences.en: The plane, which was full of fuel, scattered flaming fragments over a large area.
sentences.cn: 燃烧的碎片从装满燃油的飞机上散落到大片区域里。

sentences.en: Tuck's a flaming New Dealer but he's competent and tough.
sentences.cn: 塔克是个激烈拥护“新政”的人,但他是精明强干的硬汉子.

sentences.en: Xiangzi glared at him with flaming eyes.

phrases.tran_cn: 点火；着火；一下子燃烧起来；突然烧起来
n. 火焰稳定器，稳焰器
火焰离子化检测器；火焰电离检测器
耐火的；防爆的；耐燃性；耐燃物
火焰传播；火焰蔓延；展焰性

trans.tran_cn: 燃烧的，火红的，火焰般的，热情的，激情的
